name: BleBox
0:
”Alexa, turn on fan”
”Alexa, turn garden light red”
”Alexa, set kitchen light to 40 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
BleBox is a brand of high-quality products related to home automation. It allows you to control house and office equipment using executive devices using out unique μWiFi technology. This skill allows you to control all the BleBox devices using voice commands.

To use this Skill you must have an account on portal.blebox.eu and at least one compatible BleBox device. To configure the device use the free wBox app available from the Google Play (Android) or App Store (iOS).

The BleBox controllers must be at first properly configured that can work both in local network and from any place in the world. Follow up the proper device user manual to see how easy is the device configuration. After the initial device setting, check if you are logged in the wBox application and if the device works remotely, out of your local network. Please remember that if you disable the „Remote access” option in the device settings, the integration with Alexa cannot be obtained.
